name: Ziffit
overview:
Launched in May 2013, Ziffit.com is a UK-based media buying website. This free service allows users to sell books, games, CDs and DVDs online. Quotes are provided instantly, while funds can be transferred directly to a bank or PayPal account once a trade is complete.

Ziffit also work alongside JustGiving to allow customers to donate any proceeds to charity. From individuals to fundraising teams, the company is keen to promote good causes and encourage donations wherever possible.

To get a quote, users simply enter the barcode for all games, CDs and DVDs or an ISBN for books. They will then be given a price, which can be rejected or accepted. In total, at least 10 items are needed to complete a trade.

Currently, the service is only available to customers in the UK, although further expansion is planned in future. Delivery is free, with Ziffit using Collect+ and City Link for larger trades.
